name: Bunny Snatchers- Destroy Everything
description:
This bunny is a bad boy on the loose. NOONE can stop his madness. This evil bunny marks the level of hell: greed. In summary hes a kleptomaniac that likes to steal from homes. He ends up teaching his owner to steal and in the end they both become evil together (character in the later reboot). Cuteness always lies.

To be quite honest hes a loud burglar so GRAB as much money as you can, dont get DETECTED and GET OUT of there!
